import React, {useCallback, useState} from 'react'; import { Container } from '@material-ui/core'; import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField'; import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; import './AddBook.css' export default function AddBook() { const [values, setValues] = useState({ title: "", author: "", imageUrl: '', year: '', pages: '', description: "" }); const handleChange = (event) => { event.persist(); setValues(values => ({ ...values, [event.target.name]: event.target.value })); } const handleSubmit = useCallback((event) => { event.preventDefault(); }, []) return(

Add a New Book

 ) }
